es.upm.dit.gsi.shanks.agent

Class JasonShanksAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • jason.architecture.AgArch
      • es.upm.dit.gsi.shanks.agent.JasonShanksAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShanksAgent, jason.architecture.AgArchInfraTier, Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable, sim.engine.Stoppable

    public abstract class JasonShanksAgent
extends jason.architecture.AgArch
implements ShanksAgent
    Interface for all jason-agents executed on the simuluation. This class integrates jason-agents on Shanks.
    Author:
    a.carrera
    See Also:
